definitions.definition: To mark (a document or message) with a spoiler warning , to prevent readers from accidentally learning details they would prefer not to know.
To tell (a person) details of how a story ends etc.
examples: I've been spoilered , so I doubt I'll be able to enjoy the final episode.

main_definition: ( transitive , fandom slang ) To mark (a document or message) with a spoiler warning , to prevent readers from accidentally learning details they would prefer not to know.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , fandom slang ) To tell (a person) details of how a story ends etc.
